page.syntax: {@ @ | N | # | $( Character [ ? A ] ) [, M | # | $( Character ) [ ? B ]] }

argument.description: Character. Owner draw formatting is embedded in the text.

argument.name: N
argument.description: Numeric. An integer value representing the character position to start displaying text.
Character. Returns the current row position when used in a list.

argument.name: Character
argument.description: Character. Returns the position of the next specified character. Do not specify a character that will return a value of zero (0).

argument.name: M
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. An integer value representing the character position to stop displaying text. If not specified, the display continues to the end of the string.

argument.name: A
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. An integer value representing an offset.

argument.name: B
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. An integer value representing an offset.

page.description: The {@} operator is the 'text select' operator. It selects text from the input value (i.e. from the list of entries that are to be displayed by the list box).
